readme:
# Open-LLM-VTuber on RunPod

Voice-interactive AI companion with Live2D avatar support.

## Features
- Real-time voice conversations
- GPU-accelerated LLM inference (Ollama)
- Fast ASR with Faster-Whisper
- Natural TTS with MeloTTS
- Live2D character animations

## Access
After deployment, access via:
- WebSocket: wss://[POD-ID]-12393.proxy.runpod.net/client-ws
- HTTP: https://[POD-ID]-12393.proxy.runpod.net

## Default Model
- LLM: Qwen2.5-32B (optimized for RTX-5090)
- ASR: Faster-Whisper Large-v3-turbo
- TTS: MeloTTS (GPU-accelerated)

## First Run
First startup will download models (~20-40GB). This may take 10-30 minutes.

## Configuration
Modify `/workspace/conf.yaml` to customize settings.

## Support
GitHub: https://github.com/t41372/Open-LLM-VTuber
